content:
Prev: Timothy gets away from Fluffy Up: Timothy's Harry Potter 7th Birthday Party Next: Wizard Chess

Who's Hedwig



One person, "Harry", is blindfolded, and has to find another person, "Hedwig", by their owl noises, while the other players try to distract Harry by making other animal noises.
Taken Sunday, February 26, 2006, 03:40:01PM. Original image size: 3072x2048, 1.7Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/125s @ F10.0, ISO 200, 50mm/F1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS7 CRW Daylight, 1:3:50:50:0:25:25, Crop
